title.narrative: Children and adolescents of Oruron in action

description.narrative: The aim of the second phase of the project Children and adolescents of Oruro in Action is to develop and increase the participation of children and adolescents in their own surroundings that is in schools and in their neighborhood. The work and activities of the organizations of children and youth (student councils and the brigades) are supported and encouraged. The cooperation between the children's organizations as well as the cooperation with adults's organizations and local authorities has an important role in the project.The rights of far too many Bolivian children and young people are not recognized today. The aim of the project is that the rights of the children are recognized at all levels of the society by the children and young people themselves an d by adults. The project contributes to the the fact that the voice of children and adolescents is heard and that measures are taken to ensure equal rights to all Bolivian citizens. The beneficiaries of the project are the children and young people of Orur o in the discticts 3 and 4 their parents teachers and headmasters partner-organizations and local authorities. All the beneficiaries are provided with training and capacity building. The themes in the gatherings and workshops are for example violance and a buse bullying discrimination and racism migration leadership the importance of family nutricion and health democracy building. Through the project DNI gathers information and makes recommendations for further action to policies and practices at local and n acional level.
